brand.name: EVALUA Education
brand.tagline: Evidence-based language growth for every classroom.
brand.mission: We help Italian schools measure, strengthen, and celebrate English proficiency through digital tools, QuAET benchmarking, and internationally recognised certifications.

footer.tagline: Empowering schools with resilient, inclusive English programmes.

about.title: About EVALUA Education
about.intro: EVALUA Education is the evolution of BI Next: a research-led team of teachers, psychometricians, and technologists building the fastest way for Italian schools to deliver outstanding English programmes.

pillars.title: Pedagogy first
pillars.description: We co-design pathways with subject experts and real classrooms, aligning programmes with the CEFR and national guidelines.

pillars.title: Data with empathy
pillars.description: Dashboards translate results into actionable insights for leadership teams, not spreadsheets to ignore.

pillars.title: Sustainable impact
pillars.description: We reinvest in training and scholarships so every learner can access a trusted journey to certification.

quaet.title: QuAET: quality assurance for English teaching
quaet.intro: QuAET is our benchmark for English programmes in Italian schools. It provides a shared language for teachers, coordinators, and leadership teams to monitor progress across the academic year.
pillars: Initial placement tests to map every learner's starting point.
Modular checks that connect day-to-day practice with measurable KPIs.
Summative assessments aligned with CEFR descriptors and INVALSI expectations.
outcomes: Evidence that supports inspections and accreditation.
Coaching recommendations personalised for each department.
A pathway that prepares students for Cambridge and Trinity certifications.

solutions.title: Solutions
solutions.intro: From placement to certification, EVALUA Education delivers a single platform where schools onboard students, manage training, and monitor results.

testingPlatform.title: Testing platform
testingPlatform.intro: The EVALUA testing platform combines psychometrics with delightful UX. Schools launch digital placement, progress, and mock exams without leaving the browser.

sections.title: Adaptive delivery
sections.description: Smart routing keeps students engaged and produces CEFR-aligned scores with fewer questions.

sections.title: Instant dashboards

sections.title: Accessible anywhere
sections.description: Students test on laptops or tablets with built-in support for accommodations.

certification.title: Certification
certification.intro: We prepare students for Cambridge and Trinity certifications with scaffolded resources, live workshops, and administration support.
highlights: Diagnostic reports identify the right exam session for every learner.
Teachers access lesson plans, mock papers, and speaking prompts on demand.
Families receive clear timelines, expectations, and practice tips.

partnerships.intro: Local authorities and school networks choose EVALUA Education to activate bilingual programmes, STEM pathways in English, and scholarship funds.

initiatives.title: Teacher development

initiatives.title: Scholarships
initiatives.description: We help design bursary schemes that remove financial barriers for motivated students.

recognition.title: Recognition
recognition.intro: Our programmes are accredited by British Institutes and align with national education objectives. Explore the milestones that shaped our approach.

timeline.description: Launch of QuAET pilot across 12 campuses with the British Institutes academic board.
National expansion of the BI Next platform supporting hybrid delivery during remote learning.
First region-wide partnership delivering scholarships for 3,200 students.
Rebrand to EVALUA Education with a renewed focus on inclusive certification pathways.
